page.syntax: SQL_Statement as C = GenerateAddUserToGroupStatement as C (User as C, Group as C)

argument.name: SQL_Statement
argument.description: An add user group statement appropriate for the database.

argument.name: Group
argument.description: The name of the group to create.

page.description: Generate a SQL Add User To Group statement.
page.discussion: The .GenerateAddUserToGroupStatement() method returns the SQL statement that will add a user to a group.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection conn.open("{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}") ? conn.GenerateAddUserToGroupStatement("tom", "documentation") = "ADD USER tom TO GROUP documentation"
